inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The HIV infection has to be confirmed according to the WHO Guidelines (see Appendix IX)

inclusion.criterion: Adult male or female patients, age ≥ 18 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have given an informed consent and signed a consent form prior to beginning protocol specific procedures (Appendix VI)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients in CDC Stage A 1, 2, B 1, 2 (see Appendix Va) not yet requiring ARVs
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: WHO Performance Status of 0,1,2 (see Appendix II)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Abnormal laboratory results especially glucose level > 160 mg/dl, liver enzymes (AST, ALT) ≥ 1,5 x ULN, bilirubin ≥ 4 x ULN, alkaline phosphatase ≥ 5 x ULN, creatinine > 2,0mg/dL (>176,8 µmol)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Serious other diseases, including psychiatric disorders
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a pregnant woman with fever and chills. She has a history of dysuria, urgency, and frequency. The urine culture showed Gram-negative rod-shaped bacterial cells, leukocytes, and leukocyte casts.
